caption: Fantastic food, extremely friendly and generous staff. The spice did not disappoint - we ordered varying levels of heat, everyone was happy! Highly recommend it, especially when looking for a reasonably priced great meal.
5 stars for consistency. Great spot! Love the Zhong dumplings!! So many good and interesting dishes to try. Service is fast and usually very friendly.
Interesting food, I liked it and I will be back for more. The customer service is excellent, as well as the food. Food is prepared fresh and quick! I will be back.
Great service and excellent authentic szechuan cuisine. I recommend the tofu bean curd and especially the bean jelly. Wow!

Yesterday we arrived in this delicious restaurant for takeout which friends recommended to us. We spent a lovely time there with fine food and a professional team and a distinguished chef. We put this restaurant in our phone list and we will definitely go again soon. We warmly recommend.
Amazing food for a really amazing price. Have to try their spicy Chengdu fries and fried pork strips. Definitely low risk, high reward.
Absolutely amazing. Most authentic Sichuan/Szechuan food I’ve had in America, let alone Chicago. Lucky to have this gem here in Chicago.

Yesterday we arrived in this delicious restaurant which friends recommended to us. We spent a lovely time there with fine food and a professional team and a distinguished chef. We put this restaurant in our phone list and we will definitely go again soon. We warmly recommend.
Love this place.... I think they love me too. They know once I come through the door to get those two orders of Cheng Du Wonton ready. I don't even have to say anything. No greater feeling than that.

Very clean and nice place. The service was excellent, very courteous and kind staff. The food came out hot and fresh. Totally worth the price, as the food was very tasty as well. I had a very nice experience. Totally recommend you make a stop here.
Love the food here. ChengDu Tofu Bean Curd is on point! The staff is cool as well. Been coming here forever! Prices are reasonable.
This place is delicious. I went there this past weekend with my partner and was pleasantly surprised at how delicious the food was. Honestly my partner and I will definitely be back!

This is my favorite Sichuan restaurant in Chicago. The service is always on point and entertaining, and we have become good friends with the wait staff. The food is excellent. We have tried more than half of the menu and you cannot go wrong.
Love the food here. Roasted pork feet is on point! The staff is cool as well. Been coming here forever! Prices are reasonable.

Very clean and nice place. The service was excellent! The food came out hot and fresh. Totally worth the price, as the food was very tasty as well. I had a very nice experience. Totally recommend you make a stop here.

Everything was fantastic. Glass noodles mix, wonton in hot soup, and handmand bell dumplings! And we're not talking lazy American Chinese food. We're talking hot flavorful Sichuan! Like, REAL Chinese food!

This place exceeded my expectations so much! Hands down the best and most authentic Chinese I’ve had in Chicago. This stuff tastes just like the food I had in Chengdu...it’s sour, sweet, salty, smokey, garlicky, spicy, umami goodness, and when I say spicy I mean OH SO spicy. I got the extra spicy option for everything and they do not dumb the spice down; it had me in tears (in a good way) and was on par with the spice levels of everything I had in Sichuan. I got the douhua, zhou dumplings, and tianshuimian and was blown away by everything. You can really taste the spices like star anise and Sichuan peppercorn in their chili oil and it tastes so fresh, not old and stale like the chili oil I’ve had at some other places. To top it off, it’s super affordable and the packaging was incredibly cute and well designed - every single container was branded and they even gave me a complimentary KN95 mask with my order which made the take out experience feel so much more special during these times. Do not miss out on this place, they are truly a hidden gem in this city.
We ordered takeout from here and it was soooo good!! We will be ordering a lot more! Highly recommend!
I really like this restaurant.I would say this is one of the best and authentic Chinese restaurants in the neighborhoods. I come here to pick up a lot.

When I visited Chicago, this was my favorite place to go. It was my first time eating there and I was very happy with the food! It was fresh, absolutely delicious, and very high quality. It's all Szechuan and spicy, which is the best! Would love to visit them again.

Spicy, savory, Szechuan goodness. All the food that I ordered is delicious! Everything was flavorful and staff was friendly and helped me to choose from a great variety of dishes. I often get take out and they're always fast and consistent.

Wow, this place exceeded my expectations. My friends have been telling me about this place and how good the food is. Well, so I got to enjoy it for myself yesterday, and it was excellent. Great food, authentic taste, and friendly staff. Will visit soon!
This is an authentic Chinese place in Chicago, and if you like spicy food, you will LOVE it. Every dish is fantastic and has an amazing taste. Very tasty, and I will definitely return back.

Wow. This food was amazing. I was going in blind here and ordering on a whimsy from the menu and everything I had was very good. The hot and sour fern root noodle was my favorite. The dumplings were great. Spicy and tasty and very good price.
